name: The Dukes of Hazzard II: Daisy Dukes It Out
name_original: The Dukes of Hazzard II: Daisy Dukes It Out
description: The Dukes of Hazzard II: Daisy Dukes It Out is a racing video game developed by Sinister Games and published by SouthPeak Interactive for the PlayStation in 2000. It is based on the television series, The Dukes of Hazzard, which aired from 1979 to 1985; and is a sequel to the 1999 racing video game, The Dukes of Hazzard: Racing for Home, also developed by Sinister Games.
